column3:
> I am not quite sure about the FreeBSD instructions being in the doc/build-unix.md

The original reason for that is that the OpenBSD instructions were very long so they merited a separate file, and the FreeBSD instructions were short and simple, so they could be included in -unix. Over time they pretty much converged.
NetBSD was added recently by someone else who was unaware of the history
@laanwj that makes sense, thanks for clearing that confusion up.
